ApproxsimClient.object
Class ApproxsimBoolean

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.object.ApproxsimObject
      ApproxsimClient.object.ApproxsimSimple
          ApproxsimClient.object.ApproxsimBoolean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transferable
public class ApproxsimBoolean
extends ApproxsimSimple

ApproxsimBoolean is a Approxsim adapter for booleans.

clone

protected Object clone()
Clones this object. Notice that the Identifier is NOT cloned. Both the clone and the original object will thus keep a reference to the same Identifier object.
